text: In American Football, passer rating is a measure of the performance of passers, primarily quarterbacks. ==Passer rating leaders== As per the Pro Football Reference and Cold Hard Football Facts.Kerry Byrne, "Yearly league- wide passer rating & passer rating leaders", Cold Hard Football Facts, January 24, 2008"NFL Year-by-Year Passer Rating Leaders", Pro Football Reference, January 1, 2015 Key Pro Football Hall of Fame member ^ The player is an active player * Set record (#) Denotes the number of times a player appears in this list NFL Annual Passing Rating Leaders Season Player
